name: proteus
description: A test-facilitation framework for distributed hardware

scripts.postinstall: cd common; npm i; cd ..; cd core; npm i; cd ..; cd worker; npm i; cd ..
scripts.build-worker: cd worker; tsc -b; cd ..; webpack --config worker.webpack.config.js
scripts.build-core: cd core; tsc -b; cd ..; webpack --config core.webpack.config.js
scripts.test: cd test; tsc -b; npx jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles; cd ..

author: Austen Higgins-Cassidy (ahigginscassidy@optirtc.com)
